name: Pineapple Rum Sour
description: Bright and juicy pineapple balanced with lime—tropical, refreshing, and smooth.

name: Peach Rum Rock
description: Soft peach sweetness with a fresh citrus snap—easy and very drinkable.

name: Limoncello Pineapple Rock
description: Bright lemon and tropical pineapple come together in a sunny, smooth sip.

name: Honey Grapefruit Rum Rock
description: Fresh grapefruit softened with honey for a lightly sweet, citrus-forward drink.

name: Pineapple Rum Highball
description: Light, fizzy, and tropical—perfectly refreshing without being too sweet.

name: Peach Lemon Rum Spritz
description: Bright lemon fizz with soft peach notes—easy-drinking and refreshing.

name: Limoncello Rum Spritz
description: Sweet lemon brightness with a clean rum backbone—sunny and smooth.

name: Tropical Citrus Cooler
description: Fresh citrus and pineapple blended into a light, happy tropical cooler.

name: Classic Lime Margarita
description: Bright, crisp lime and tequila with just enough sweetness for balance.

name: Peach Margarita
description: Stone-fruit sweetness layered over a classic margarita base.

name: Pineapple Margarita
description: Juicy pineapple and lime with a smooth tequila finish—tropical and bright.

name: Limoncello Margarita
description: Fresh lime and sweet Italian lemon combine for a vibrant citrus margarita.

name: Mai Tai
description: Classic tiki balance of rum, lime, and almond—rich, citrusy, and iconic.

name: Piña Colada
description: Creamy, tropical, and indulgent—pineapple and coconut in perfect harmony.
